original: Eriksson, Johan Martin, överlärare, Gamleby, f. 4/1/88 i Asker, Örebro k, av Erik Andersson o. Stina Söder. G. 16 m. Marta Rosendahl. Barn: Stig f. 17, Sverker 21, Gudrun o. Ingemar 32. — Folkskoll :ex. i Strängnäs 11, vik. folkskoll. i Gärdserum 11-12, ord. 13-16, i Gamleby sed. 17, överlär. sed. 31. Led. av kyrko- o. ■skolråd sed. 19, fclksk :istyr. sed. 32, v. ordf. 39, ’skol-kassör 25-40, iled. av styr. f. Gamleby folkbibi. o. dess bibi. sed. 17, led. av barnav:nd sed. 25, ordf. i pens :nd sed. 31, led. av komm:fullm. 31-34 o. sed. 47, av .kyrkofullm. ’Sed. 45, led. av o. v. ordf. i Gamleby föreläsn :fören. Let-terstedtska stip. 38. överförmynd. sed. 46. Hobby: astronomi (eget ob-servatorium).
translated: Eriksson, Johan Martin, head teacher, from Gamleby, born on January 4, 1888 in Asker, Örebro county, to Erik Andersson and Stina Söder. Married to Marta Rosendahl in 19xx. Children: Stig, born in 1917, Sverker in 1921, Gudrun and Ingemar in 1932. Passed the elementary school examination in Strängnäs in 1911, substitute elementary school teacher in Gärdserum from 1911-1912, regular teacher from 1913-1916, in Gamleby since 1917 and head teacher since 1931. Member of the church and school council since 1919, member of the elementary school board since 1932, vice chairman since 1939, school treasurer from 1925-1940, member of the board of Gamleby public library and its library since 1917, member of the child welfare committee since 1925, chairman of the pension committee since 1931, member of the municipal council from 1931-1934 and since 1947, member of the church council since 1945, member and vice chairman of the Gamleby lecture association. Recipient of the Letterstedt scholarship in 1938. Appointed as guardian in 1946. Hobby: astronomy (has a personal observatory).
